articles.title: White lung syndrome: Doctor separates fact from fiction - WDIV ClickOnDetroit
articles.description: If you found yourself here because you’re worried America will be consumed by “white lung syndrome,” I have good news, it’s hype.
articles.content:
DETROIT If you found yourself here because youre worried America will be consumed by white lung syndrome, I have good news, its hype.

articles.author: Lane Brown
articles.title: What We Know About the 'Mystery' Dog Illness - Curbed
articles.description: Dog owners are worried about the “mystery” dog illness spreading in North America, but vets say there’s no need to panic just yet.
articles.content: Dogs in parts of North America have been catching whats being called a mysterious respiratory illness. According to many terrifying reports, veterinarians have been unable to identify the cause and s… [+11215 chars]
